p: 2-(4-aminophenyl)-1-(4-methylbenzyl)cyclopropane-1-carboxylic acid (12). The target compound was obtained as an orange semi-solid compound in 40% yield after purification with methanol/dichloromethane (2:98). 1H NMR (400 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 7.10 − 7.00 (m, 6H), 6.68 (d, J = 8.4 Hz, 2H), 3.20 (d, J = 15.7 Hz, 1H), 2.90 − 2.78 (m, 1H), 2.30 (s, 3H), 1.88 (dd, J = 14.5, 9.0 Hz, 2H), 1.36 (dd, J = 7.2, 5.0 Hz, 1H). 13 C NMR (101 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 180.8, 145.2, 137.1, 135.3, 130.2, 128.8, 128.5, 126.2, 115.2, 33.9, 32.6 30.6, 21.0, 18.5. HRMS (ESI): calculated for C 18H 19O 2N [M-H] 280.13321 found 280.13467.
